dcterms:creator: U. M. L. Group
dcterms:description: A highly imbalanced dataset consisting of 284,807 anonymized credit card transactions, with a significant imbalance ratio of 1:578, where only 0.17% of the transactions are fraudulent.
dcterms:title: European Credit Card (ECC) dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Drummond
R. C. Holte
dcterms:description: A technique for addressing class imbalance in datasets by randomly removing instances from the majority class.
dcterms:title: Random Under Sampling (RUS)

dcterms:creator: C. Drummond
R. C. Holte
dcterms:description: A technique for addressing class imbalance by randomly duplicating instances from the minority class.
dcterms:title: Random Over Sampling (ROS)

dcterms:creator: N. V. Chawla
K. W. Bowyer
L. O. Hall
W. P. Kegelmeyer
dcterms:description: A technique that generates synthetic samples for the minority class to balance the dataset.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Minority Over-Sampling Technique (SMOTE)

dcterms:creator: I. Tomek
dcterms:description: A technique that removes instances from the majority class that are close to instances of the minority class.
dcterms:title: Tomek link

dcterms:creator: P. Hart
dcterms:description: A technique that reduces the size of the training set by removing instances that are misclassified by their nearest neighbors.
dcterms:title: Condensed Nearest Neighbor (CNN)

dcterms:creator: M. Kubat
S. Matwin
dcterms:description: A technique that selects instances from the majority class while ensuring that the minority class is represented.
dcterms:title: One side Selection (OSS)

dcterms:creator: D. L. Wilson
dcterms:description: A technique that edits the training set by removing instances that are misclassified by their nearest neighbors.
dcterms:title: Edited Nearest Neighbor (ENN)

dcterms:creator: J. Laurikkala
dcterms:description: A technique that improves the identification of difficult small classes by balancing class distribution.
dcterms:title: Neighborhood Cleaning Rule (NCL)
